text.title: Senior Telegraph writer Peter Oborne alleges paper suppressed reports on HSBC
text.head: Senior Telegraph writer Peter Oborne alleges paper suppressed reports on HSBC
Sources

list.item: Roy Greenslade. "Peter Oborne may be a maverick but his Telegraph revelations are dynamite" — The Guardian , February 18, 2015
Adam Sherwin. "Peter Oborne resignation: Senior writer quits Telegraph dramatically over HSBC allegations" — The Independent , February 17, 2015
Peter Oborne. "Why I have resigned from the Telegraph" — openDemocracy , February 17, 2015
